lead_paragraph: Justen Glad scored his first MLS goal, Luke Mulholland added another and Real Salt Lake beat Sporting Kansas City 2-1 on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Real Salt Lake Hands Sporting Kansas City Its First Loss
headline.main: Real Salt Lake Hands Sporting Kansas City Its First Loss
